organizations: Texas Assn of Private and Parochial Schools
lead_paragraph: The Texas Catholic Conference called for “a comprehensive review” of the Texas Association of Private and Parochial Schools, or Tapps, a group that organizes athletic competition for 200 schools in the state.
snippet: The Texas Catholic Conference called for “a comprehensive review” of the Texas Association of Private and Parochial Schools, or Tapps, a group that organizes athletic competition for 200 schools in the state.
